artist: Designer: Attributed to Robert Johnson; Manufacturer: Napper & Davenport
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
markings: Incised on bottom: [The \'Cube\' Trademark, Patent # / Made in England / Cube Teapots LTD, Leicester / Sole Manufacturers in Metal / T.W.2S / 5]
text: Elegance was equally important as space-saving design to the Cunard Steamship Company, which commissioned this design for use on its luxury ocean liners.  First class passengers enjoyed this silver-plated set, while second- and third-class travelers were provided with ceramic versions.
title: "Cube" coffee and tea set
